attributes.action: Stagecoach Gold sunday service between Dartmouth and Torquay
attributes.additional_details:
after checking the stagecoach gold timetables, i noticed that plymouth to torquay gets a service 7 days a week and services finish around 11pm.

i feel that this is unfair to the people of the Dartmouth service as our last bus leaves torquay at 1745. and has NO services on a sunday at all which i don't see as fair or good to customers.

the point of this petition is to get extra services put on during the week and to have a sunday service put on so we get treated fairly and have the same as the plymouth run
